name: Sledge Slide
description:
Try to collect as many presents as possible in 10 s. Use left and right arrows to control the sledge. Clocks give you extra time.

Contribution to Trijam 98.

As there was no snow outside today, my daughter (7) and I created a virtual snow ride.

Assets used:
* Sledge - "Low Poly Ultimate Pack" by polyperfect https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733
* UI - "Frozen GUI Pack" by ricimi https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/frozen-gui-pack-51624
* Background Music - "Christmas - Music Pack" by Tao & Sound https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/christmas-music-pack-1257/
* SFX - "CHRISTMAS – SFX PACK" by Tao & Sound https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/christmas-sfx-pack-1259/
